backend/main.mo: Main actor defines platform data types, branding state, media/tutorial/product/user models, and initializes access control, token system, and storage-backed state maps.
backend/token.mo: Implements token system with balances, transaction histories, and operations for minting, transferring, spending, and retrieving token data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a branding-update feature to relevant frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend React/TypeScript files.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template setting the document title to 3Docarinas and loading the frontend entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, handles auth and profile setup flow, applies theme provider, and includes global components like AI chat and toasts.
frontend/src/components/AddProductDialog: Dialog for creating new products with image upload, validation, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/AddTutorialDialo: Dialog for adding tutorials, including video upload or selection, metadata input, and submission logic.
frontend/src/components/admin/BrandingSe: Admin section to edit site name, slogan, logo, and icon with file uploads and preview handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/HeroSettin: Admin interface for editing hero headline, subheadline, and hero image with upload and preview logic.
frontend/src/components/admin/PageSettin: Admin UI for editing per‑page titles, subtitles, and banner images with upload and reset support.
frontend/src/components/AIAssistantPanel: Component displaying AI assistant feedback and suggestions, polling backend responses based on video timestamp with enable/disable control.
frontend/src/components/AIChatTutor.tsx: Floating chat widget that handles user messages, auto-scrolling, and generates simple rule‑based AI responses for ocarina learning.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Shopping cart drawer with quantity controls, token or Stripe checkout flows, and user authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/EditProductDialo: Dialog for editing product info and images with reorder, upload, and validation features.
frontend/src/components/ExternalBlobImag: Image component that loads ExternalBlob URLs with loading and error fallback states.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component handling navigation, branding, authentication, and dynamic favicon updates.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: Displays a centered animated loading screen with a music icon and message.
frontend/src/components/MediaLibraryMana: Admin media manager for uploading, listing, and deleting video files with progress tracking and permission checks.
frontend/src/components/MintTokensDialog: Dialog for admins to mint tokens by specifying recipient, amount, and optional description.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for new users to create a profile with username and bio and submit it to the backend.
frontend/src/components/RestoreProductsD: Dialog that restores predefined product templates by uploading image assets and creating product entries.
frontend/src/components/SendTokensDialog: Dialog for sending tokens to another user with balance validation and optional description.
frontend/src/components/ShareRecordingDi: Dialog for uploading an audio/video recording, creating a post, and showing upload progress.
frontend/src/components/StripeConfigDial: Dialog for entering a Stripe secret key and allowed country codes and saving the configuration.
frontend/src/components/WorkWithUsDialog: Dialog for submitting a work‑with‑us application with name, email, and message.
frontend/src/config/appBuildInfo.ts: Provides helpers to read build metadata from environment variables and format or detect environment info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, access control, branding, media, and various app data via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind CSS layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/cartStore.ts: Implements a Zustand store for managing cart items, quantities, and operations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the admin panel with permission checks and tabbed sections for managing content and settings.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityPage.tsx: Displays community posts with banner, actions, and dialogs for sharing recordings or applying to work.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page with hero content, feature cards, and lists of featured tutorials and products using fetched settings and data.
frontend/src/pages/LearningPage.tsx: Displays a learning banner, difficulty filters, and a tutorials grid with data fetched from queries and optional authentication.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a failure message after an unsuccessful payment with navigation options back to the store or home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Clears the cart, refreshes queries, shows a success toast, and displays confirmation UI with navigation options after a successful payment.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Fetches and shows the logged-in user’s profile, token balance, uploaded items, and purchased items with navigation to wallet.
frontend/src/pages/StorePage.tsx: Displays the product store with cart integration, admin tools for editing and deleting products, and automatic cart opening for checkout flows.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: React wallet page showing token balance and transaction history with send-token dialog and identity checks.
frontend/src/types.ts: Shared TypeScript enums and interfaces for tutorials, posts, settings, chat, AI interactions, and token transactions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash and query routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, container settings, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project state describing app rename to 3Docarinas and pending Stripe settings restoration feature requests.
